member.name: M:Interface::Microsoft#Finance#Analysis#PaymentPracticeDataGenerator.GenerateData(Payment Practice Data@,Payment Practice Header)
member.summary: Generates the data for the Payment Practice report from the source defined in the Header Type enum value.

member.name: M:Interface::Microsoft#Finance#Analysis#PaymentPracticeLinesAggregator.PrepareLayout
member.summary: Prepare the layout to be used for Payment Practice report that is suitable for the aggregation type of the header/lines.

member.name: M:Interface::Microsoft#Finance#Analysis#PaymentPracticeLinesAggregator.GenerateLines(Payment Practice Data@,Payment Practice Header)
member.summary: Generate the lines for the Payment Practice report based on the Payment Practice Data raw data and Payment Practice Header fields.
member.param: Raw data generated with DataGenerator, based on header type.
The document to link lines to and take configuration from.

member.name: M:Interface::Microsoft#Finance#Analysis#PaymentPracticeLinesAggregator.ValidateHeader(Payment Practice Header@)
member.summary: Validate if the Payment Practice Header is suitable for the aggregation type of the header/lines.
member.param: The document header that needs checking.
